ECan chairman Peter Scott to face council as his future is debated https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/ecan-chairman-peter-scott-to-face-council-as-his-future-is-debated/4CGAW35PIZH4DLR3LTZSGBNAK4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/ecan-chairman-peter-scott-to-face-council-as-his-future-is-debated/4CGAW35PIZH4DLR3LTZSGBNAK4/ Jonathan LeaskCouncillors are set to discuss Peter Scott's role tomorrow. Rural communities fear NZ Post retreating from farming areas https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/rural-communities-fear-nz-post-retreating-from-farming-areas/JMAUY2FIW5DLJBCHAGZV7XOXU4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/rural-communities-fear-nz-post-retreating-from-farming-areas/JMAUY2FIW5DLJBCHAGZV7XOXU4/ Postal services in Māpua and Upper Moutere are to stop next month.
